CustomField.description: Secure ("https://") url where a large, 250 x 250 pixels, image is hosted to display on sponsor related pages and printed materials. Valid image file types include *.gif, *.png, *.jpg. Recommend the file size does not exceed 50kb.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Secure ("https://") url where a large, 250 x 250 pixels, image is hosted to display on sponsor related pages and printed materials. Valid image file types include *.gif, *.png, *.jpg. Recommend the file size does not exceed 50kb.
CustomField.label: Image URL
